p: Mentha x piperita L. var. Mitcham and Mentha arvensis var. piperascens Malinv. ex L. H. Bailey were obtained from “Safiabad agricultural and natural resources research and education centre.”The phenologic stage of the collected plants was “bud formation” and the official gene bank where voucher specimens are deposited is the “Medicinal Plants and Drugs Research Institute Herbarium (MPH), Shahid Beheshti University of Tehran”.
